metaTags.metaTitle: Cloudflare Application Services | Security and Performance
metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare provides application services that help you deliver rich user experiences for Internet applications — all while prioritizing security without compromising on performance.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

promotionalBanner.desktopText: Cloudflare was recently named a Leader in the Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Web Application and API Protection (WAAP)

leftHalf.entityTitle: Protect and Supercharge Applications and APIs Everywhere
leftHalf.title: Protect and Supercharge Applications and APIs Everywhere
leftHalf.copy:
Making web apps and APIs secure, fast, and productive with a connectivity cloud

- Easily protect applications and APIs from abuse, stop bad bots, thwart DDoS attacks, and isolate suspicious activity, all powered by platform intelligence.
- Increase web application performance with infinitely scalable connectivity across every location.

promotionalBanner.desktopText: Cloudflare named Leader in the Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for WAAP

contentList.title: Connected with all networks, enterprises, and clouds
contentList.description: Cloudflare protects millions of web properties and serves tens of millions of HTTP requests per second on average. We seamlessly connect your apps and APIs hosted in public, private and hybrid clouds, and hosted on-premises.

contentList.title: Built-in application services platform intelligence
contentList.description: Cloudflare leverages data from various application and network sources to secure and accelerate web apps and APIs. Security, performance, compliance, and privacy functions are built in without disrupting connectivity.

contentList.title: Unified and simplified Interface
contentList.description: Simplify security and accelerate performance of your web apps hosted anywhere with Cloudflare's connectivity cloud. Consolidate with our easy to use and integrated console, deep, request-level analytics, and machine learning assisted policy

relatedBlades.title: Never compromise security for performance
relatedBlades.copy:
- Built natively from the ground up with a composable and programmable architecture. Every service runs from every data center. 
- Content from any source is always a blink away for incredible and connected experiences on any device, regardless of traffic spikes, attacks, and outages.
- Better, more intelligent security through faster protections and data-driven insights from our connectivity cloud.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare for Enterprises Large and Small Illustration
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare for Enterprises Large and Small Illustration

relatedBlades.title: What do analysts say about us?

columnContent.title: Gartner® named Cloudflare a "Leader" in Web Application and API Protection
columnContent.description: Cloudflare has been recognized as a Leader in the 2022 "Gartner Magic Quadrant for WAAP" report. We believe this recognition validates that we protect against emerging threats faster, offer tighter integration of security capabilities, and deliver powerful ease of use and deployment.

columnContent.title: IDC named Cloudflare a "Leader" in CDN services
columnContent.description: Cloudflare has been recognized as a Leader in the 2022 IDC MarketScape for Worldwide Commercial Content Delivery Network Services. In particular, IDC described Cloudflare as "a highly innovative vendor, continuing to invest in advanced technologies such as virtualization, serverless, AI/ML, IoT, HTTP3, 5G and (mobile) edge computing."

cards.title: Discover and secure your APIs
cards.description: 92% of organizations faced API attacks in the last year.

cards.title: Stop losing users to poor experiences
cards.description: Slow loading websites cost retailers an estimated $2B per year.

cards.title: Protect from denial of service (DDoS) attacks
cards.description: Cloudflare mitigated the largest ever DDoS attack at 201M requests per second.

cards.title: Augment security with threat intelligence
cards.description: Threat intelligence and operations that bolsters security postures and SOC effectiveness utilizing: Cloudflare Threat Intelligence.

cards.title: Accelerate internet applications
cards.description: Cache static content on Cloudflare's network, optimize image files, compress dynamic content, route requests to the least congested path, and much more utilizing: Cloudflare CDN, Cloudflare DNS and Argo Smart Routing.

cards.title: Ensure app availability
cards.description: Improve your app availability with a scalable infrastructure backbone that prevents downtime and unavailability utilizing: Cloudflare Availability.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Explore use cases

relatedBlades.title: Powerful application and API security from the Cloudflare connectivity cloud
relatedBlades.description: Enable no-gaps security by making Cloudflare's connectivity cloud a true single pass of unified control. All Cloudflare app and API security, managed from a single console, is delivered from our global edge network of 300 data centers in more than 100 countries for incredible performance, reliability, and unlimited scalability.

columnContent.title: DDoS Protection
columnContent.description: Protect against DDoS attacks of any size and kind.

columnContent.title: Web Application Firewall
columnContent.description: Protect your business-critical web applications from attacks.

columnContent.title: API Gateway
columnContent.description: Make our massive global network your secure API gateway.

columnContent.title: Bot Management
columnContent.description: Manage good / bad bots — stop bad bots with threat intelligence at scale.

columnContent.title: Page Shield
columnContent.description: Protect against Magecart and JavaScript supply chain attacks.

columnContent.title: Rate Limiting
columnContent.description: Protect against abusive behavior — DDoS, brute force login, etc.

columnContent.title: SSL / TLS Encryption
columnContent.description: Secure visitor data and boost SEO rankings.

columnContent.title: CAPTCHA Alternative
columnContent.description: Turnstile delivers frustration-free, CAPTCHA-free web experiences to website visitors.

relatedBlades.title: Superior application performance and user experience everywhere
relatedBlades.description: Cloudflare makes your web applications perform like never before. With our connectivity cloud, content is always a blink away for incredible experiences on any device, anywhere. We ensure business continuity, regardless of traffic spikes, attacks, and outages.
